channel.title: [667] Checking for Updates -1%
channel.description:
inb4 learn to code/stop programing
Okay here is the issue. I'm trying to change the [PORT] of the server because i'm already running a server on 43594.
I want to change the server port to 43595.
I have went into server.java and changed port to 43595. Also, I have changed port in Loader.java Client sided to 43595.
I changed all ip address in loader.java, Client.java, and Gamestub.java to my server's port.
I even went into C:/Windows/System32/Drivers/etc/hosts.file to make 127.0.0.1 go with my no-ip.
I don't know why but it is staying at Checking for updates -1%.
I did put cache files in the data/cache/ folder, and when it didnt work, i used the one that game with the client and still no working option.
I think the server will work if i put it back to 43594, but I dont want to change the port on my main server.
can anyone help me solve this issue?

item.title: [667] Checking for Updates -1%
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

inb4 learn to code/stop programing

Okay here is the issue. I’m trying to change the [PORT] of the server because i’m already running a server on 43594.

I want to change the server port to 43595.

I have went into server.java and changed port to 43595.
Also, I have changed port in Loader.java Client sided to 43595.

I changed all ip address in loader.java, Client.java, and Gamestub.java to my server’s port.

I even went into C:/Windows/System32/Drivers/etc/hosts.file to make 127.0.0.1 go with my no-ip.

I don’t know why but it is staying at Checking for updates -1%.

I did put cache files in the data/cache/ folder, and when it didnt work, i used the one that game with the client and still no working option.

I think the server will work if i put it back to 43594, but I dont want to change the port on my main server.

can anyone help me solve this issue?
